attributes.action: Temporary reduce fuel duty whilst fuel costs are at an all time high
attributes.additional_details: There is currently a fuel crisis that is crippling low income families, businesses, the transport industry and professional drivers. With the looming increase in utility prices many people and families will be plunged into poverty. A cut in fuel duty would help alleviate this.
attributes.background: Help the uk public with the increasing and unaffordable fuel costs by temporarily reducing fuel duty until such times as fuel prices stabilise.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599089
